description:
Purpose: To deploy 2 tier servers - Web Server & DB Server in AWS and associate them to a newly created VPC.
1) Create an isolated network for the cluster - VPC, Public & Private Subnet, Route, Network Security Group will be created.
2) Provision Web Server (EC2 Instance) and associate it to Internet Gateway.
3) Provision DB Server (EC2 Instance). Web Server can access DB Server through private network.

Inputs Required: Image ID, Keypair Name, Instance Type & SSH Location.

Use case(s): Can be used to quickly provision a 2-tier servers (Web & DB) on the go with an isolated VPC and network configurations.
name: AWS_Deploy_2-Tier_VM_New_VPC
